title: All 32 - Los Angeles Rams: What Sean McVay is doing to help Jared Goff's development with Jourdan Rodrigue (Football 6/23)
description:
If we recorded this episode of 'All 32' last year, the conversation around the Rams would be much different. Now, the expectations aren't Super Bowl, but rather to remain competitive. Jourdan Rodrigue of The Athletic joins Will Brinson to break down the outlook for Los Angeles in 2020, first examining the coaching of Sean McVay (2:30), the team moving on from Todd Gurley (4:30) and how Jared Goff is being developed (7:00). Of course, we have to mention Aaron Donald leading the defense (13:00). Lastly, what does a successful season look like for the Rams (15:00)?
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @JourdanRodrigue
